title: Full-Stack Developer
description: Build and maintain full-stack features using React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Collaborate with designers, write clean code, build REST APIs, and deploy frequently.

title: Backend Engineer (Node.js)
description: Design and optimize scalable APIs in Node.js with Express/TypeScript. Use PostgreSQL, Docker, and AWS services. Focus on performance and reliability.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Build ML pipelines for NLP and tabular data, train and evaluate models with scikit-learn and TensorFlow, and collaborate with infra on MLOps.

title: Frontend Engineer (React)
description: Develop beautiful, responsive UIs in React with strong JavaScript fundamentals. Write tests and collaborate closely with design.
